headline: Sabatini pushes Constitutional Carry special session
sentences: Sabatini, who has frequently clashed with legislative leaders, has proposed constitutional carry bills in recent years, but they have not moved forward.
State Rep. Anthony Sabatini wants backing from lawmakers to hold a special legislative session about a constitutional carry? gun proposal.
Brian Kemp signed a bill that will allow people in Georgia to carry concealed handguns without first getting licenses from the state.
Sabatini, a Howey-in-the-Hills Republican who is running for Congress, made the request Wednesday, two days after Georgia Gov.
Sabatini is trying to use a process of polling lawmakers to force a special session on the issue.
